title: Case-Based Instructional Strategies for Overcoming Learning Obstacles in Elementary Fraction Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Fractional Concepts and Fundamental Arithmetic Operations
context.additional_context: Analysis of cognitive disability cases among elementary mathematics learners in VR environments and development of solution strategies

learning_goals: Learners can describe three or more common cognitive obstacles encountered during elementary fraction problem-solving.
Learners can diagnose error causes by analyzing fraction problem cases presented in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can design case study-based customized teaching methods to support understanding of fraction concepts.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
